project.name: Mape furlane
project.description: A map which renders names in Friulian language (standard and local variants) for Friuli region

tags.description: Name in Friulian language (standard). Used as name tag.
Name in Friulian language (local variant). If defined, rendered in smaller size after name:fur
Fallback name. Used only if name:fur doesn't exist for the object.
